heroHeadline: Spain Mediterranean Experience - Boutique Costa Blanca Developments
heroIntro: Spain Mediterranean Experience takes a focused approach to property development, concentrating their expertise on 2 carefully selected developments featuring 12 properties. This boutique strategy ensures each project receives the attention to detail that discerning buyers expect.

aboutSection.title: About Spain Mediterranean Experience
aboutSection.content: Spain Mediterranean Experience operates with a quality-over-quantity philosophy in the Costa Blanca property market. Their concentrated portfolio in the Rojales and surrounding areas allows them to maintain high standards across every property, from initial design through to final handover.

specializationSection.title: Development Focus
specializationSection.content: Spain Mediterranean Experience focuses on the Vega Baja region, an area known for its established international community and excellent value. Their developments in Rojales and surrounding zones offer buyers the authentic Spanish experience combined with modern amenities and easy access to beaches, golf courses, and Alicante airport.

qualitySection.title: Quality & Design
qualitySection.content: Properties by Spain Mediterranean Experience feature thoughtful design that maximizes indoor-outdoor living. Expect quality kitchens, modern bathrooms, and generous outdoor spaces - all designed for the Mediterranean climate and lifestyle.

reasons.title: Boutique Approach
reasons.description: Focused portfolio means dedicated attention to each development and buyer.

reasons.title: Value Location
reasons.description: Vega Baja offers excellent value while maintaining quality of life.

reasons.title: Established Community
reasons.description: Strong international presence with English-speaking services throughout.

faqs.question: Where are Spain Mediterranean Experience properties located?
faqs.answer: Their developments are concentrated in the Vega Baja region, including Rojales and surrounding areas of Costa Blanca South.

faqs.question: What makes Vega Baja a good location?
faqs.answer: Vega Baja offers excellent value, established international communities, easy airport access, and proximity to both beaches and golf courses.

faqs.question: Do Spain Mediterranean Experience properties include pools?
faqs.answer: Yes, many of their villas feature private pools, while apartment developments include communal pool facilities.

conclusion: Spain Mediterranean Experience offers a curated selection of new build properties for buyers who appreciate personalized service and quality construction. Their Vega Baja developments represent excellent value in an established, welcoming community.
